author: Red Means Recording
description:
Modern DAWS have a ton of amazing tools that let us see into the music we create. I've been relying on them to get to where I am, and I wanted to share how I use them. We'll cover bass and kick matching, stereo imaging, multiband loudness, and spectral analysis.

Some free tools to help: 
Imager: https://www.izotope.com/en/products/ozone-imager
Loudness: https://youlean.co/youlean-loudness-meter/
Multiband Splitter: https://soundfingers.com/freebies/dub-spl-4/

Support the channel on Patreon: http://bit.ly/rmrpatreon
Take a lesson with me: https://rmr.media/education

Find my music here: 
Bandcamp: http://bit.ly/2Kq617o

YouTube Music: https://bit.ly/3PZQ4ol
iTunes: https://apple.co/2pqh3SK
Amazon Music: https://amzn.to/2O9q1fe

title: Visualizing Music for Better Mixes (and More)
